snippet.title: New World: Aeternum - What is New World: Aeternum?
snippet.description:
You’re shipwrecked on the island of Aeternum. As you search the island, you’ll unveil hidden secrets, meet mysterious inhabitants, explore wild landscapes and ancient ruins as you fight, forage, and forge your destiny. In this action RPG, you’ll control magical forces, summon mounts, and find your ideal playstyle. Play solo, or team up with others in cross-platform play. 

Buy Now:
PlayStation: https://bit.ly/3Wlh9rj
Xbox: https://bit.ly/4bQgT8a
Steam: https://bit.ly/4bIY2ff

Learn more about New World: Aeternum - https://bit.ly/3kTlRtV 
Sign up for the New World: Aeternum Newsletter - https://bit.ly/3YFYyoW

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL 
X: https://bit.ly/2N8oIkq 
Instagram: https://bit.ly/3u0DeeG 
TikTok: https://bit.ly/39k3gE9

 #officialtrailer #launchtrailer #gameplaytrailer #Aeternum
